name: TownePlace Suites Fayetteville Cross Creek

reviews.text: Stayed the weekend, Friday July 17th to Monday the 20th, & wished we could of stayed the week - had some friends passing thru town on Sunday too so told them to come stay & they were just as happy (got compliments for choosing such a lucky find...)
reviews.title: New & First & Fabulous!

aka: Towneplace Suites Fayetteville Cross Creek Hotel
description: Welcome to Real Living at the TownePlace Suites by Marriott Fayetteville Cross Creek. Our spacious suites include functional space for both living and working. Enjoy our complimentary breakfast, full kitchens in every room, wireless internet, gym, outdoor swimming pool and 24 hour coffee service in our lobby! Our all-suite hotel is located close to the military communities of Fort Bragg and Pope Airfield. When it comes to shopping, both Wal-Mart and Sams Club are conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel, while the Cross Creek Mall is only a short drive away. Additionally, there are 3 restaurants within walking distance; Logan's Roadhouse, Memphis BBQ & Cracker Barrel. We hope you come and experience our excellence at the TownePlace Suites Fayetteville!
